In this passage, the speaker is reflecting on their family's holiday celebrations and traditions, and how these have been a source of joy and connection. They seem to be sharing a personal and intimate story, and inviting the reader to imagine and appreciate the beauty of these moments. The passage also touches on the theme of peace and unity, as the speaker hopes that one day there will be no more war and people will be able to come together in peace
